","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"option":{"optionsLHS":[{"text":"Here ‘she’ refers to?","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":1,"$$hashKey":"object:12994"},{"text":"The gift that she had wa","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":2,"$$hashKey":"object:12995"},{"text":"The speaker here is","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":4,"$$hashKey":"object:13026"}],"optionsRHS":[{"text":"Grandma","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":1},{"text":"She could climb a tree","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":2},{"text":"the poet","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":4}],"questionCount":0},"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"questionMaxScore":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"“Eversince childhood, she would had this gift”     ","title":"“Eversince childhood, she would had this gift”     ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"English","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"English","max_score":3,"level":"MEDIUM","category":"MTF"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
